mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(ur.userId,"-1") as userId,IFNULL(u.username,"-1") as username,IFNULL(r.id,"-1") as roleId,IFNULL(r.pid,"-1") as rolePid, IFNULL(r.roleName,"-1") as roleName,IFNULL(r.describes,"-1") as roleDesc,IFNULL(u.createTime,"-1") as createTime,IFNULL(u.updateTime,"-1") as updateTime from user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id = ur.userId LEFT JOIN role r on ur.roleId = r.id where r.id =#{rolePid}
